com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.picker.color

Class DynamicColorPicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.view.DynamicView
            • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.picker.color.DynamicColorPicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class DynamicColorPicker
extends DynamicView
    A color picker inside a DynamicView to display multiple grids of colors and their shades.

    It will be used internally by the DynamicColorPreference but can be used by the other views also.

        Set color string according to the selected color.
        Parameters:
        color - The selected color.
        setHSV - true to set HSV vales.
        setRGB - true to set RGB values.

        Set presets according to the selected color.

        color - The selected color.

                         int color)
